title: 19th Century Tradecard - Cosack / Marshall & Ball - moved to eBay
author: deadballera

posts.post_title: 19th Century Tradecard - Cosack / Marshall & Ball - moved to eBay
posts.post_content:
Victorian baseball  trade card from the 1880's.

Center Fielder

 some creasing, clean back

These are colorful Lithographs printed by Cosack & Co, Buffalo NY. 

 

Marshall & Ball Clothiers

Newark, New Jersey

At the very bottom reads that they were entered into the Library of Congress in 1882.

 

I have seen similiar cards that have had advertising from Wright & Ditson Sports Equipment

MOVED TO eBay on 4/26

[url]http://cgi.ebay.com/ws/eBayISAPI.dll?ViewItem&item=400212281638&ssPageName=STRK:MESELX:IT[/url]
